title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, October 8, 2020
description: 100 years ago today, the science fiction author Frank Herbert was born in Tacoma, Washington. He is best known for "Dune" (1965) and its sequels.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: 100 years ago today, the science fiction author Frank Herbert was born in Tacoma, Washington. He is best known for "Dune" (1965) and its sequels.
